description: Numbers n such that string 4,1 occurs in the base 6 representation of n but not of n-1.
mathematica: f[n_] := Length[StringPosition[ToString[FromDigits[IntegerDigits[n, 6]]], "41", 1]]; Select[Table[n, {n, 10000}], f[#] > 0 && f[# - 1] == 0 &] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jul 20 2011 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
